com.ipt.ebsa.template

Class TemplateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.template.TemplateManager

  • public class TemplateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    To use
    1. instantiate by passing in the path to the root of the dirs containing the templates
    2. use put(String, Object) to set template parameters
    3. call render(String) with the name of the template to render the template
    If you want use the same context to render another template, then just call render(String) again. If not, then call resetContext() to clear out the context.
